channel.title: Uke Along Artist » Anna Kendrick And Justin Timberlake
channel.description: Artist » Anna Kendrick And Justin Timberlake

item.title: Anna Kendrick and Justin Timberlake - True Colors
item.description:
This tutorial will show you how to play True Colors on the ukulele by Anna Kendrick and Justin Timberlake. The chords used are C F G Am E7. Original Key is E.
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on the bell next to subscribe.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The uke chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.

item.title: Anna Kendrick and Justin Timberlake - True Colors
item.description:
This tutorial will show you how to play True Colors on the ukulele by Anna Kendrick and Justin Timberlake. The chords used are G C D Em B7. Original in Key E.
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on the bell next to subscribe.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The uke chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.
